description: Metrics for the EigenDA load generator (single host)

panels.description: A breakdown of the latency spent in each stage of a dispersal lifecycle.
panels.title: Dispersal Stage Latency

panels.description: A count of dispersal successes per second.
panels.title: Dispersal Successes / Second

panels.description: A count of dispersal failures per second.
panels.title: Dispersal Failures / Second

panels.description: Number of dispersal operations in flight
panels.title: Dispersals In Flight

panels.description: The average latency that the blob spends in various statuses.
panels.title: Average Dispersal Latency By Phase

panels.description: For all blobs in flight, the number of blobs in each stage of dispersal.
panels.title: Dispersal Stage Count

panels.description: Time taken to disperse a blob, broken down by various thresholds.
panels.title: Dispersal Latency Thresholds

panels.description: Rate of blob dispersals per second
panels.title: Dispersal Rate

panels.description: A breakdown by stage of the time needed to read blobs from the validators.
panels.title: Validator Read Stage Latency

panels.description: Validator read successes per second.
panels.title: Validator Read Successes / Second

panels.description: Validator read failures / Second
panels.title: Validator Read Failures / Second

panels.description: Number of validator operations in flight.
panels.title: Validator Reads In Flight

panels.description: Time required to read from the validators.
panels.title: Validator Read Latency Percentiles

panels.description: The average time required to read a blob from the validators.
panels.title: Average Validator Read Latency

panels.description: For all validator reads in flight, the number of blobs in each stage.
panels.title: Validator Read Stage Count

panels.description: Rate of blob dispersals per second
panels.title: Validator Read Rate

panels.description: The average latency that the blob spends in various statuses during a read from the validators.
panels.title: Average Validator Read Latency By Phase

panels.description: Number of relay read operations in flight.
panels.title: Relay Reads In Flight

panels.description: Rate of relay reads per second
panels.title: Reads Per Relay / Second

panels.description: The average time required to read a blob from the relays.
panels.title: Average Relay Read Latency

panels.description: Successful relay read operations.
panels.title: Succesful Relay Reads / Second

panels.description: Failed relay read operations.
panels.title: Failed Relay Reads / Second

title: EigenDA Load Generator (Single Host)
